December 6 Nasa and its
crew members celebrated the 25th anniversary of the
establishment of the international space station ISS on the occasion
Today, the astronauts in outer space
had an online chat with
officials at the Johnson Space Center.
Nasa deputy administrator Bob
Kabana mentioned the achievements of the ISS
to date, which has had 3,000 studies and
surveys.  Observations from 108 countries around the world
have been conducted for an incredible 25
years. I admire the work of
astronauts in their quest to
improve the quality of life on Earth
through scientific research and
Next is preparing for
deeper space exploration in the future.
ISS mission chief astronaut Andreas
Morgon expressed hope that many
countries and private companies will use the ISS
research laboratories.
More countries will

their space sector. The ISS
began construction in 1998 with the
participation of the US, Russia, Europe, Japan
and Canada. The project is worth 60 million.  This billion dollar project
has become the most expensive space project
created by humans at the present time.
Doctors here have just completed the
first ink sac removal surgery
using a robot combined with a unit magnet.
developers of this technology say its advantages
are less invasive and increased
efficiency. California-based startup levita magnetics
has
developed a Surgical platform called M in which
surgeons will attach a  Five
small needles into the organ that needs surgery and then using a
high-power leg-mounted robot arm to operate on the patient from
outside the platform will help reduce incisions,
reduce pain for the patient and shorten
recovery time.  healing as well as scars. With
this system, doctors can also control
the camera themselves to have a clearer and more stable view.
We want surgeons to
work more efficiently and use
technology to improve their productivity.  Since then,
doctors have been able to perform
more surgeries on a day with greater efficiency. The
m surgical platform was
approved by the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
in September this year and for the first time.
was put into use in the US in

from the invasion of spontaneous settlements.
Green turtles here have the habit of emerging
from water villages.  Arabian sea to go ashore to lay
nests and incubate eggs.
Karachi is the busiest in Pakistan. Pakistan
is also where this type of sea turtle lays
eggs, but with the rapid pace of urbanization,
it is very difficult for sea turtles to find a place where
they feel safe to lay eggs.  nesting,
so the project to help turtles have a chance to
survive was born. In fact, green turtles are also the
last turtle species to choose the Pakistani sea
as a place to lay and hatch eggs. I call on

animals. The environment said that every

Binh Duong province police said they are working

Duong province.  For example, road number 743 My Phuoc Van lasted more than
20 km, causing many motorcyclists to slip and

The police also found the
container truck.  and verified that the driver of
the vehicle was Dang Van Dung, in a
container carrying 19 tons of liquid plasticizer that was
pumped into a specialized plastic bag
during circulation. The vehicle's trunk
leaked, causing the liquid to flow onto the road, so the
driver  turned on the emergency lights to run back to the yard
to wait for processing. The
owner of the above shipment said that this liquid
was imported from Malaysia to Vietnam and used
to produce plastic resins, not on the list of
toxic and dangerous substances.
Today, a grocery store in
Nhan Trach district, Dong Nai province, suddenly
violently processed many goods and burned down. The
fire broke out at about 2:00 p.m. at a
grocery store in Ap Ba, Long Tho commune,
Nhan Trach district, Dong Nai province. At that time, the
fire suddenly broke out.  The fire broke out fiercely because
the grocery store contained many flammable items, so
the work of extinguishing the fire encountered many difficulties. The fire
threatened a number of houses and motel rooms
nearby. We received reports that the
fire department had dispatched fire engines and
firefighters.  Soldiers and officers arrived at the scene after
about 1 hour of effort. The fire was
controlled, but the grocery store was
destroyed. Some neighboring houses were affected. The
cause of the fire is being investigated. This afternoon, the
fire suddenly broke out.  caught fire
at the boat repair station along the Phu Hai river in
Phan Thiet city, Binh Thuan province. At
least 10 large-capacity fishing boats caught fire
in the repair area
even though it happened at about 3:00 p.m. due to
wooden boats and windy weather.  So the fire burned
quickly and quickly spread to other boats.
At the fire location, there were still many boats and boats
on the repair dock. Immediately after that, three
firefighting vehicles and dozens of officers and soldiers
arrived at the scene. However, the vehicles
could not handle the fire.  approaching the fire location because
the road down to the boat dock is a small alley, the force
had to pull the sprinkler wire but the fire was
very strong and it took about 16 hours for a
small firefighting vehicle to enter the alley to approach closer
to the fire location to stop the fire.  spraying
water until 5:00 p.m. the same day the fire was
